title: Steelers-Dolphins MNF Recap, Dissecting Division Races/Preseason Win Totals (Football 10/29)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Steelers overcoming an early deficit to defeat the Dolphins on Monday Night Football (:15). The guys then hit on some news including the Chargers firing OC Ken Whisenhunt (20:45), Joe Flacco being ruled out (30:00) and the trades of Kenyan Drake (37:45) and Leonard Williams (42:15). Next, Will, Ryan John and Sean take a midseason look at division races and evaluate the status of preseason win totals, (46:00) before answering some 5-star questions from Apple Podcasts (1:07:15).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to break down the Steelers 27-14 victory over the Dolphins on Monday night.
